de.tr7zw.nbtapi

Class NBTItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tr7zw.nbtapi.NBTCompound
      • de.tr7zw.nbtapi.NBTItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadableItemNBT, ReadableNBT, ReadWriteItemNBT, ReadWriteNBT

    public class NBTItem
extends NBTCompound
implements ReadWriteItemNBT
    NBT class to access vanilla/custom tags on ItemStacks. This class doesn't autosave to the Itemstack, use getItem to get the changed ItemStack
    Author:
    tr7zw

    • Constructor Detail

      • NBTItem

        @Deprecated
public NBTItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Deprecated. 
        Constructor for NBTItems. The ItemStack will be cloned! Deprecated: Please use the NBT class to work with items. It's up to 400% faster and provides less ways to mess up code.
        Parameters:
        item -

      • NBTItem

        protected NBTItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item,
                  boolean directApply,
                  boolean readOnly,
                  boolean finalizer)
        Parameters:
        item -
        directApply -
        readOnly - When turned on, no copy of the source item is created. Modifying the stack in that case is not valid! Also overwrites directApply

      • NBTItem

        @Deprecated
public NBTItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item,
                           boolean directApply)
        Deprecated. 
        Constructor for NBTItems. The ItemStack will be cloned! If directApply is true, all changed will be mapped to the original item. Changes to the NBTItem will overwrite changes done to the original item in that case.
        Parameters:
        item -
        directApply -

      • applyNBT

        @Deprecated
public void applyNBT(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Deprecated. 
        Apply stored NBT tags to the provided ItemStack.

        Note: This will completely override current item's ItemMeta. If you still want to keep the original item's NBT tags, see mergeNBT(ItemStack) and mergeCustomNBT(ItemStack).

        Parameters:
        item - ItemStack that should get the new NBT data

      • mergeNBT

        @Deprecated
public void mergeNBT(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Deprecated. 
        Merge all NBT tags to the provided ItemStack.
        Parameters:
        item - ItemStack that should get the new NBT data

      • hasNBTData

        public boolean hasNBTData()
        Returns true if the item has NBT data. This needs to be checked before calling methods like remove, otherwise the value might be wrong!
        Specified by:
        hasNBTData in interface ReadableItemNBT
        Returns:
        Does the ItemStack have a NBTCompound.

      • modifyMeta

        public void modifyMeta(BiConsumer<ReadableNBT,org.bukkit.inventory.meta.ItemMeta> handler)
        Gives save access to the ItemMeta of the internal ItemStack. Supported operations while inside this scope: - any get/set method of ItemMeta - any getter on NBTItem All changes made to the NBTItem during this scope will be reverted at the end.
        Specified by:
        modifyMeta in interface ReadWriteItemNBT
        Parameters:
        handler -

      • modifyMeta

        public <T extends org.bukkit.inventory.meta.ItemMeta> void modifyMeta(Class<T> type,
                                                                      BiConsumer<ReadableNBT,T> handler)
        Gives save access to the ItemMeta of the internal ItemStack. Supported operations while inside this scope: - any get/set method of ItemMeta - any getter on NBTItem All changes made to the NBTItem during this scope will be reverted at the end.
        Specified by:
        modifyMeta in interface ReadWriteItemNBT
        Parameters:
        handler -

      • convertItemArraytoNBT

        @Deprecated
public static NBTContainer convertItemArraytoNBT(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack[] items)
        Deprecated. 
        Helper method that converts ItemStack[] to NBTContainer with all its data like Material, Damage, Amount and Tags. This is a custom implementation and won't work with vanilla code(Shulker content etc).
        Parameters:
        items -
        Returns:
        Standalone NBTContainer with the Item's data

      • convertNBTtoItemArray

        @Nullable
 @Deprecated
public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack[] convertNBTtoItemArray(NBTCompound comp)
        Deprecated. 
        Helper method to do the inverse of "convertItemArraytoNBT". Creates an ItemStack[] using the NBTCompound. This is a custom implementation and won't work with vanilla code (Shulker content, etc.). Will return null for invalid data. Empty slots in the array are filled with AIR Stacks!
        Parameters:
        comp -
        Returns:
        ItemStack[] using the NBTCompound's data
